entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Backport #63582 to net6.0 (ERROR_INVALID_PARAMETER in PosixSignalRegistration.Unregister) #79959
  • `IOptions<RecordType>` with `services.Configure<RecordType>` throws #79958
  • Add support for customizing name-matching for all properties when using `ConfigurationBinder` #79957
  • Segmentation fault (core dumped) #79955
  • [API Proposal]: Introduce System.Net.IPAddressRange #79946

Closed

  • IReadOnlySet<T> is not covariant #79954
  • TripleDESCryptoServiceProvider Decrypt lost data #79924
  • NativeAOT cannot create generic type even if it is rooted using rd.xml #79930
  • RVA static access causes access violation #4860
    Future
  • Optimizations for the XorShift algorithm #4617
    Future
  • Superfluous mov(s) opcodes around left shifting/vmovmskps #430
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Base64.Decode: fixed latent bug for invalid input that is less than a block-size #79952
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Fix condition in backport.yml to also trigger on schedule #79951
  • Remove null annotation from *HeaderValue.Parse methods #79950
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Fix the ARM's `double` register name displayed in JitDisasm/JitDump #79949
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for JsonUnmappedMemberHandling #79945
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Implementation of Lemire's nearly divisionless method #79790
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Rename RdXmlFile to _DirectivesFile #79926
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix SignedCms certificate collection modification with attribute certificates #79940
    area-System.Security
  • Allow Base64Decoder to ignore space chars, add IsValid methods and tests #79334
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • runtime: add RIDs for anolis distro #66132
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-24
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • The dotnet pack doesn't work together with -p:NuspecProperties when multiple properties provided #15482

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Proposal: Allow specifying directory for Source Generator emitted files #66122
  • [Hot Reload] Editing switch expression at fly requires rebuild even if you remove only whitespace from code. #66120
  • SyntaxGenerator.Argument doesn't generate RefKind.In properly #66118
  • Long switch expression is duplicated in `InferTypesWorker_DoNotCallDirectly` overloads #66116

Closed

  • Expression Evaluator Regression - Expression Evaluation in Watch seems to do not take usings into account #61914
    17.4
  • IDE0031 codefix shouldn't remove existing braces #66036
    Backlog

PullRequests

Merged

  • Merge main to release/dev17.6 #66121
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Keep the block of else-if statement in "Use null propogation" codefix #66048
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Do not treat enum base list as type context for completions #66119
    Area-IDE, Community, Next

Updated

  • Do not suggest `required` after `async` and vise versa #66090
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Qualify `Task.FromResult` when removing `async` modifier #66114
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Option store #66069
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • PageTitle Headoutlet + Changing layouts causes rendering to fail #45752
  • Improvements to null state analysis on AuthorizationResult #45751
  • Run on Mac OS 13.0 in Helix #45749
  • Custom model binding in Blazor's SupplyParameterFromQueryAttribute #45747
  • 3rd party notices link does not work #45745

Closed

  • Swagger syntax too verbose in MinAPI #45683
    Discussions
  • Perf improvement: json #45744
  • .NET 7 ErrorBoundary is not catching exceptions raised in async methods returning a ValueTask #45724
  • DefaultProblemDetailsWriter Is Not RFC 7231 Compliant #45051
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #45730
  • Perf regression: stage1publishaot #45739

PullRequests

Created

  • Adopt consistent approach for defining InternalsVisibleTo in the repo #45748
    community-contribution

Merged

  • Update Helix.Common.props #45737
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • DefaultProblemDetailsWriter.CanWrite without Accept header #45158
    area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2073331 #45630
    area-mvc
  • Add option to not cache assembly references in runtime razor compilation #41086
    area-mvc, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-24
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Shared column with different CLR types gets projected out twice #25272
    Backlog
  • SplitQuery per-table definition #29089
    Backlog
  • Generate expression trees in compiled models (query filters, value converters) #29924
  • Proxies retain a reference to pooled DbContext after it is returned to the pool #25486
    8.0.0
  • Include( x => x.Child.OrderBy ) does not work in Postgresql #29925
  • Error when building bundle in Dockerfile #29927

PullRequests

Created

  • Dispose service properties when context is disposed or returned to the pool #29929
